title: WitnessCredits and ProfileFooter components
description:
Create witness credits (film credits pattern) and profile footer components matching the approved prototype at `playground/concept-b-proof.html`.

**Reference the prototype HTML/CSS carefully for all styling decisions.**

## Component 1: WitnessCredits

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/witness-credits.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/witness-credits.test.tsx`

Displays collaborators as film-credits-style rows — each person who can vouch for the builder's work.

**Props:**
```typescript
interface WitnessProject {
  name: string
  role: string  // what they did, e.g. "design", "API"
}

interface Witness {
  initials: string
  name: string
  role: string  // their title, e.g. "Product Designer"
  projects: WitnessProject[]
}

interface WitnessCreditsProps {
  witnesses: Witness[]
}
```

**Design from prototype:**
- Section label: "WITNESSED BY" — uses the accent-line pattern (40px × 3px accent bar above, then label in 12px uppercase ink-tertiary)
- Each witness is a single row (flex, align baseline, gap 16px, padding 14px 0)
- Row separator: `box-shadow: 0 -1px 0 surface-secondary` on subsequent rows (NOT border — follows no-borders rule)
- Identity column (min-width 220px): 28px avatar circle (surface-secondary bg, 9px initials) + name (font-weight-500, 14px)
- Role column (min-width 140px): 12px mono font, ink-tertiary
- Projects column (flex-1): projects listed inline with middot separators. Project name in 13px ink-secondary, role in parentheses in 11px ink-tertiary

## Component 2: ProfileFooter

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/profile-footer.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/profile-footer.test.tsx`

The STATE-tier footer strip with 3 columns of metadata.

**Props:**
```typescript
interface TribeItem {
  name: string
  memberCount: number
}

interface LinkItem {
  label: string  // e.g. "GitHub"
  value: string  // e.g. "@mayachen"
  href: string
}

interface InfoItem {
  label: string  // e.g. "Timezone"
  value: string  // e.g. "PST · UTC-8"
}

interface ProfileFooterProps {
  tribes: TribeItem[]
  links: LinkItem[]
  info: InfoItem[]
}
```

**Design from prototype:**
- Top separator: 1px solid surface-secondary (this is the one place a border is used in the footer)
- 3-column grid (1fr 1fr 1fr), gap 32px
- Padding: 40px 0 80px
- Each column has an "OVERLINE" header: 11px font-weight-500 uppercase, letter-spacing 0.06em, ink-tertiary, margin-bottom 10px
- Tribes column: tribe name in font-weight-500 13px, detail (member count) in 12px ink-tertiary, 8px gap between tribes
- Links column: label in 10px uppercase ink-tertiary, value in 13px ink-secondary, link values in accent color. 8px gap between items.
- Info column: same label/value pattern as links but no link styling

## Component 3: DomainTags

File: `src/frontend/src/components/features/domain-tags.tsx`
Test: `src/frontend/src/components/features/domain-tags.test.tsx`

Simple tag display for domain expertise areas (placed in hero identity).

**Props:**
```typescript
interface DomainTagsProps {
  domains: string[]  // e.g. ["System Design", "Product", "Infrastructure", "ML / AI"]
}
```

**Design:** Flex wrap, 6px gap, margin-top 14px. Each tag: 12px text, ink-secondary color, surface-secondary background, 5px 12px padding, 6px border-radius.

**Tests must cover:**
- WitnessCredits: renders all witnesses, shows names/roles/projects, middot separators between projects, handles single-project witness
- ProfileFooter: renders 3 columns, tribe names and counts, link values as anchor tags, info label/value pairs
- DomainTags: renders all tags, handles empty array

- `src/frontend/src/components/features/profile-footer.tsx` exists with 3-column grid
- `src/frontend/src/components/features/domain-tags.tsx` exists with tag display
- WitnessCredits uses accent-line section label pattern
- Row separators use box-shadow, NOT border
- ProfileFooter has overline headers matching prototype
- Tests exist for all 3 components
- `cd src/frontend && npx vitest run` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx eslint .` passes
- `cd src/frontend && npx tsc --noEmit` passes
